instructions: On your Android device, open the Chrome app . To the right of the address bar, tap More and then Settings . Under "Advanced," tap Privacy . Tap Do Not Track . Turn the setting on or off.
Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap Passcode . Swipe the slider to turn on Wrist Detection .
Open the Apple Watch app on the iPhone and tap Passcode . Select Turn Passcode On . Enter your desired passcode.
